snippet.title: HORSES - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Welcome to the farm, where the sun is hot, the grass is green, and the horses are waiting for you. But as the sun sets, and shadows creep across the land, the tranquility fades, and the farm's facade begins to crumble. Will you survive the summer, or will the farm claim yet another victim? In any case, we're sure your summer working experience will be truly unforgettable…HORSES launches in 2024.
